config.dynamic_fps.title: Configure Dynamic FPS
config.dynamic_fps.warn_cloth_config.0: Cloth Config is required to configure Dynamic FPS from within Minecraft.
config.dynamic_fps.warn_cloth_config.1: Either install Cloth Config, edit the config file, or use the default settings instead.
config.dynamic_fps.idle_time_tooltip: Minutes without input until Dynamic FPS activates the Idle state while the game is focused.
config.dynamic_fps.idle_condition_none_t: Always activate Idle state when inactive for too long.
config.dynamic_fps.idle_condition_vanill: Disable Dynamic FPS idling. Uses the vanilla setting instead.
config.dynamic_fps.idle_condition_on_bat: Enable the Idle state when inactive for too long and on battery.
config.dynamic_fps.uncap_menu_frame_rate: Remove the 60 FPS limit in the main menu.
config.dynamic_fps.ignore_initial_click_: Ignore accidental input when clicking on the unfocused game window.
config.dynamic_fps.battery_tracker_toolt: Toggle all battery-related features on or off.
config.dynamic_fps.battery_tracker_switc: Automatically enable the On Battery state when on battery.
config.dynamic_fps.battery_tracker_notif: Receive in-game notifications about your battery status.
config.dynamic_fps.battery_critical_leve: Set which battery charge level is considered critical.
config.dynamic_fps.battery_indicator_deb: Whether the battery indicator is visible while the debug overlay is open.
config.dynamic_fps.volume_transition_spe: Set the speed at which the game volume will be adjusted per second.
config.dynamic_fps.graphics_state_minima: Minimal graphics cause the world to reload!
config.dynamic_fps.show_toasts_tooltip: Whether to keep displaying or delay toast notifications.
config.dynamic_fps.run_garbage_collector: Free up unused memory when switching to this status.
config.dynamic_fps.download_natives_desc: Using the battery features requires an additional library.
Set whether the mod may download this component on your behalf.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.dynamic_f: Reduce resource usage while Minecraft is in the background or idle.
